sourcesContent:
<template> 
    <input type="text" :value="modelValue" @input="updateInput">
</template>
<script>
export default {
    name: 'my-input',
    props: {
        modelValue: [String,Number]
    },
    methods: {
        updateInput (event) {
            this.$emit('update:modelValue',event.target.value)
        }
    }
}
</script>
<style scoped>
input {
    border: 2px solid green;
    padding: 20px;
    margin-top: 10px;
}
 
</style>
